QuestData.Title: In The Face!
QuestData.Description: The naga are using those giants to stamp paths through our minefields. Time to put that SFG to use!$B$BHead over to the entrance to the southern minefield - I think you can figure out the rest.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use an SFG to kill an Enslaved Son of Arkkoroc in the southern minefield.
QuestData.CompletionText: Sweet little piece of goblin technology, that thing is.
QuestData.RewardText: BAM! In the face! Nice shot, kid.
